headline: Les Ebdon appointed new director of Offa: Twitter round-up
text: It's little surprise, considering the political storm that preceded the appointment, that there has been much talk and debate over Les Ebdon's new job as director of fair access. Just a few hours since the announcement blogs, tweets and Urgent Questions have ensued. So, we've used Storify to round up some of the links and discussion. Please let us know in the comments if you have read something interesting that we have missed.
